name: HouseElwynn1
_source: s;Elwynn;Damn it all...{w} Still haven't picked up these damned bottles.
s;Elwynn;If Elspeth knew what a sty this place was, she'd...
s;Elwynn;She'd...{w}  She wouldn't be surprised.|Nobody would, but she'd...{w} believe I could change.{w} Unlike the others.|Don't know what's worse.|How long has it been...?
s;Elwynn;"My finest brew," he says.{w} 'S swill,{w} 's what it is!
#Elwynn throws the bottle, and it shatters
s;Elwynn;That's what I think of yer "finest brew,"{w} ya lousy prick!|Betcha took a leak in the bottle 'fore sellin' it to me, too, eh?|Betcha think I wouldn't notice!{w} I always notice!
#He stalks around the room, back and forth across the screen between each line
s;Elwynn;I notice all the dirty looks!
s;Elwynn;Should just skip town...{w} skip town, n' take what I want on my way out!|Rob 'em all blind, every last one of 'em!
s;Elwynn;All of 'em...{w} Even Quinley, always smiling at me like I don't see it's fake...|Elwynn, acting like it's her sworn duty to save me...
s;Elwynn;Maybe I don't want to be saved!{w} Maybe I don't want yer smiles or yer pity!|Maybe I don't want to be teaching these stupid, stupid brats!!!
#He breaks something in a fit of anger - more bottles?
s;Elwynn;Just leave me alone!{w} Just let me drink in peace!|I just...{w} Just...
s;Elwynn;Just wanna...{w} go back to the way it was...
s;;Just me...{w} and my flask...|and not a care in the world...;center
s;Elwynn;...{w} Ah, hell.{w} Could die tonight, and I'd die as that man...{w} hell, and I'd deserve it, too.
s;Elwynn;This flask...{w} how many times did I fall asleep with this thing in my hand?
s;Elwynn;Aye...{w} Aye, I'm that man.{w} And for one more night...|think I oughta stay that man.{w} But tomorrow...
s;Elwynn;...{w} Tomorrow, if I'm still alive, I'll throw this damn thing in the sea for good.
